reviewText:
I think this video is sweet because it teaches the basics of skateboarding. I wouldn't be skateboarding if it wasn't for you because none of my friends would of taught me. I'm thinking about entering a tournament pretty soon! Skateboarding is my life now. I love that video and to tell you the truth I watch it alot! I've been looking for a skateboarding video for a long time! Thanks so much!
  JOSH N.
skateboarding is skateboarding... if you feel you need to have every video out there... then get it. But other wise... go pick up the new Blueprint video (Wainting For The World) its much better.
